## plot types

Generic example

```python
# x and y are lists
sns.plottype(x=df['xvar'], y=df['yvar'])

# x and y are columns in dataframe
sns.plottype(x='xvar', y='yvar', data=df)
```

### boxplot

```python
sns.boxplot(x, y)
```

### distplot

```python
sns.distplot(x)
```

E.g. overlay two density plots

```python
ax1 = sns.distplot(x1, hist=False, col='r', label='var1')
sns.distplot(x2, hist=False, col='b', label='var2', ax=ax1)
```
